<title level="1" pfs="">[Gilded Gunner Safecracker](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1975)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">

([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 25

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Gilded Gunner Safecracker](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1975)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 57

**Perception** +12

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +3

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Alchemical Fuse](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1580), [Concealed Holster](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1202), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Dueling Pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=201) (10 rounds), [_golden silencer_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1585) (affixed to dueling pistol), [_invisibility potion_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=187), [Pyronite](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1579)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 65

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dueling pistol +14 ([Concealable](/Traits.aspx?ID=327), [Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The safecracker deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Gilded Gunner Safecracker
